text: "Don't Give Up" is a song by English singer Peter Gabriel featuring Kate Bush. It was taken from his 5th studio album So. It went to number 9 in the United Kingdom, number 5 in Australia, number 4 in the Netherlands, number 4 in Ireland and number 16 in New Zealand. It has been covered by Alicia Keys, Willie Nelson, Sinéad O'Connor, Natalie Bassingthwaighte and Lady Gaga. ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Kate Bush songs Category:Peter Gabriel songs Category:Lady Gaga songs Category:Alicia Keys songs Category:Sinéad O'Connor songs Category:Willie Nelson songs Category:Art pop songs
title: Don't Give Up (Peter Gabriel and Kate Bush song)
